task.title: Creating an animated GIF from video file on Abode Photoshop CC
task.shortdesc: Creating an animated GIF from your own personal video files using Adobe Photoshop is easy and simple. Using Adobe Photoshop gives you more control over editing and to easily add text.

prereq.p: You will need the following before creating an animated GIF through Adobe Photoshop:

step.cmd: Go to File > Import > Video Frames to Layers
Dialogue box will appear. Choose which section of the video file you want to turn into a GIF.
step.info: Can turn entire video into a GIF or can select a section

step.cmd: Go to Timeline view to view each layer the video has been separated into
Once completed, save file to convert into GIF format
